item.description:
All,

Saturday we'll be playing at 3pm b/c of a JV Football game.

If you have never joined us, please consider coming out. Whether you are a good flag football player or not, you will be welcome. Even if you don't know how to play, its easy to catch on. Everyone that has come already, come on out.

From the Redline 'T' get off at Alewife then follow the Rindge Ave signs to the fields. Look for the football stadium area, and we'll be on the turf. If you are driving, use the address/map that is part of this notice.

Hope to see everyone there.
-Frank
item.name: TIME CHANGE - 3PM - SAT - FLAG FOOTBALL - RUSSELL FIELD
